data.chText: （喜爱地）轻拍
data.enText: to touch sb/sth gently several times with your hand flat, especially as a sign of affection

data.chText: 她轻轻地拍着狗的头。
data.enText: She patted the dog on the head.

data.chText: 他轻拍着妹妹的手安慰她。
data.enText: He patted his sister's hand consolingly.

data.chText: 用软毛巾把脸搌干。
data.enText: Pat your face dry with a soft towel.
pat sb/yourself on the back

data.chText: 表扬，称赞（某人 / 自己）
data.enText: to praise sb or yourself for doing sth well

data.chText: （友善的）轻拍，拍打
data.enText: a gentle friendly touch with your open hand or with a flat object

data.chText: 轻轻拍一下头
data.enText: a pat on the head

data.chText: 他温情地拍了拍她的膝盖。
data.enText: He gave her knee an affectionate pat.

data.chText: 一小块黄油
data.enText: a small, soft, flat lump of butter
a pat on the back (for sth/for doing sth)

data.chText: 表扬；赞许
data.enText: praise or approval for sth that you have done well

data.chText: 他工作兢兢业业，值得嘉许。
data.enText: He deserves a pat on the back for all his hard work.

data.chText: 过于简易的；不自然的；油滑的

before.enText: of an answer, a comment, etc.

data.enText: too quick, easy or simple; not seeming natural or realistic

data.chText: 小说的结尾有点过于简单，令人难以置信。
data.enText: The ending of the novel is a little too pat to be convincing.

data.chText: 这些问题没有简单的答案。
data.enText: There are no pat answers to these questions.
have/know sth off pat
have/know sth down pat

data.chText: 了如指掌；滚瓜烂熟
data.enText: to know sth perfectly so that you can repeat it at any time without having to think about it

data.chText: 所有的答案他都胸有成竹。
data.enText: He had all the answers off pat.
stand pat

data.chText: 固执己见；拒不改变决定
data.enText: to refuse to change your mind about a decision you have made or an opinion you have
pat sb/yourself on the back

data.chText: 表扬，称赞（某人 / 自己）
data.enText: to praise sb or yourself for doing sth well
a pat on the back (for sth/for doing sth)

data.chText: 表扬；赞许
data.enText: praise or approval for sth that you have done well

data.chText: 他工作兢兢业业，值得嘉许。
data.enText: He deserves a pat on the back for all his hard work.
have/know sth off pat
have/know sth down pat

data.chText: 了如指掌；滚瓜烂熟
data.enText: to know sth perfectly so that you can repeat it at any time without having to think about it

data.chText: 所有的答案他都胸有成竹。
data.enText: He had all the answers off pat.
stand pat

data.chText: 固执己见；拒不改变决定
data.enText: to refuse to change your mind about a decision you have made or an opinion you have

tr: the sound made by a gentle blow
pat or squeeze fondly or playfully, especially under the chin

value.def: If you pat something or someone, you tap them lightly, usually with your hand held flat.

example.ex: 'Don't you worry about any of this,' she said patting me on the knee...
example.tran: “这个你什么都不用担心，”她轻拍着我的膝盖说。

example.ex: The landlady patted her hair nervously...
example.tran: 女房东焦虑地轻抚着她的头发。

example.ex: Wash the lettuce and pat it dry.
He gave her an encouraging pat on the shoulder.
example.tran: 他轻轻地拍了一下她的肩膀表示鼓励。

value.def: A pat of butter or something else that is soft is a small lump of it.
If you say that an answer or explanation is pat, you disapprove of it because it is too simple and sounds as if it has been prepared in advance.

example.ex: There's no pat answer to that...
example.tran: 那个问题不是随随便便就能回答的。

example.ex: Despite the film's merits I felt it was too pat.
example.tran: 尽管那部电影不乏亮点，但我还是觉得它过于敷衍了事。

value.def: If you give someone a pat on the back or if you pat them on the back, you show them that you think they have done well and deserve to be praised.

example.ex: The players deserve a pat on the back...
If you do something well, give yourself a pat on the back.
example.tran: 事情做得漂亮时，给自己一点表扬。

value.def: If you have an answer or explanation down pat or off pat, you have prepared and learned it so you are ready to say it at any time.

example.ex: I have my story down pat...
example.tran: 我对自己想好的说法已烂熟于心。

example.ex: He had his answer off pat.
example.tran: 他对自己如何作答胸有成竹。

value.def: If you stand pat, you refuse to change your mind about something.

example.ex: On the other side, the men stood pat and were unyielding...
example.tran: 在另一方面，那些人固执己见，不肯让步。

example.ex: It makes it hard for the Fed to do anything but stand pat till the economy's direction becomes clearer.
example.tran: 这让美联储几乎无计可施，在经济发展方向明朗之前只好硬挺着。

trans: 詹宁斯；帕特·詹宁斯；柏·真宁斯；被柏·真宁斯；赞宁斯
